sentence.Network_en: FLOWERS and coconut leaves are daily necessities in Balinese life.
sentence.Network_cn: 花和椰叶,为巴厘人生活中不可或缺的素材.

sentence.Network_en: Inscribed around its base is a charm in Balinese.
sentence.Network_cn: 其底座周围刻着巴厘语的符咒.

sentence.Network_en: The event is held the day after Balinese Hindus celebrate Silence Day.
sentence.Network_cn: “接吻节”的前一天是巴厘岛印度教徒的“安静节”.
